agal.name: EarthShader
agal.vertexShader: // vc0-3 = world * view * projection matrix // va0.xyz = vertex position // va1.xy = texture coordinates m44 op, va0, vc0 mov v0, va1 mov v1, va0
agal.fragmentShader: // v0.xy = texture coordinates // v1.xyz = vertex normal // fs0 = diffuse map // fc0.xyz = (0.0, 0.0, 1.0) // fc1.xyz = (1.05, 3.0, 2.) // fc2.xyz = light color tex ft0, v0, fs0 <2d,repeat,linear> mul ft1, v1, fc1.z dp3 ft1, ft1, fc0 sub ft1, fc1.x, ft1 pow ft1, ft1, fc1.y mul ft1, fc2.xyz, ft1 add ft1.xyz, ft0.xyz, ft1.xyz mov ft1.w, ft0.w mov oc, ft1
